Job Posting: 178019 - Position: S26 Developer Intern - Client Secrets Management - Summer 2026 178019 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/11/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/04/2026 10:41 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 Address Line 2 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country 1Password 4711 Yonge Street 10th Floor Toronto M2N 6K8 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description About 1Password 2026 - Summer S26 Developer Intern - Client Secrets Management - Summer 2026 178019 Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months Fully Remote CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List At 1Password, we're building the foundation for a safe, productive digital future. Our mission is to unleash employee productivity without compromising security by ensuring every identity is authentic, every application sign-in is secure, and every device is trusted. We innovated the market-leading enterprise password manager and pioneered Extended Access Management, a new cybersecurity category built for the way people and AI agents work today. As one of the most loved brands in cybersecurity, we take a human-centric approach in everything from product strategy to user experience. Over 180,000 businesses, from Fortune 100 leaders to the world's most innovative AI companies, trust 1Password to help their teams securely adopt the SaaS and AI tools they need to do their best work.
